faqs.question: How do I submit my music to HLPFL Records?
faqs.answer: Visit our contact page at hlpfl.org/contact, fill out the submission form, and include links to your music along with a brief bio. Our A&R team reviews all submissions within 1-2 weeks.

faqs.question: What genres does HLPFL Records work with?
faqs.answer: We work with artists across all genres including Pop, R&B, Hip-Hop, Trap, Rock, Electronic, Jazz, and Classical. We're open to exceptional talent regardless of genre.

faqs.question: Do I need to have released music before submitting?
faqs.answer: While having released music helps, we also consider demos and unreleased material from promising artists. Quality and potential matter most.

faqs.question: What should I include in my submission?
faqs.answer: Include your best 3-5 tracks, a brief bio, links to your music on streaming platforms, and any relevant social media profiles. High-quality recordings make a strong impression.

faqs.question: How long does it take to hear back?
faqs.answer: Our A&R team reviews all submissions within 1-2 weeks. Due to high volume, we can only respond to artists who align with our current roster needs.

faqs.question: Do you charge submission fees?
faqs.answer: No, we never charge fees to review music submissions. Be wary of any label that does.

faqs.question: What happens if you're interested in my music?
faqs.answer: If your music aligns with our vision, an A&R representative will contact you to discuss potential partnership opportunities and next steps.

faqs.question: What services does HLPFL Records provide?
faqs.answer: We offer comprehensive services including artist development, music production, global distribution, publishing & rights management, marketing & promotion, and career management.

faqs.question: Can you help with music production?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have state-of-the-art recording studios and work with world-class producers, engineers, and sound designers.

faqs.question: How does distribution work?
faqs.answer: We distribute music to all major streaming platforms (Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube Music, etc.) and can arrange physical distribution for albums and vinyl.

faqs.question: Do you help with marketing and promotion?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We provide social media marketing, PR campaigns, radio promotion, playlist placement, and influencer partnerships.

faqs.question: What about music publishing?
faqs.answer: We offer full publishing services including copyright registration, royalty collection, sync licensing opportunities, and publishing administration.

faqs.question: How long has HLPFL Records been in business?
faqs.answer: HLPFL Records was founded in 2009 and has over 15 years of experience in the music industry.

faqs.question: Where is HLPFL Records located?
faqs.answer: We're based in Grand Rapids, Michigan, with connections and operations across the United States and internationally.

faqs.question: How many artists do you work with?
faqs.answer: We currently work with 50+ active artists and have released over 200 projects, generating 1B+ streams globally.

faqs.question: What makes HLPFL Records different from other labels?
faqs.answer: Our artist-first approach, comprehensive support services, transparent partnerships, and commitment to long-term career development set us apart.

faqs.question: Do you work with independent artists?
faqs.answer: Yes! We work with both emerging independent artists and established talent, providing tailored support for each career stage.

faqs.question: How can I listen to HLPFL artists?
faqs.answer: Visit our Artists page at hlpfl.org/artists/ or our Releases page at hlpfl.org/releases/ to discover our roster and their music.

faqs.question: How do I contact HLPFL Records?
faqs.answer: Email us at contact@hlpflrecords.com, call +1 (555) 123-4567, or use the contact form at hlpfl.org/contact/. Office hours are Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST.
